text: @RudyGiuliani Dude YOU, #Trump & #ComplicitGOP said it's no worse than flu. Reality 𝟭𝟯𝟰𝗸 𝗽𝗲𝗼𝗽𝗹𝗲 𝗵𝗮𝘃𝗲 𝗱𝗶𝗲𝗱 related to 3.11M "confirmed #Covid19 cases". 134k/3.11M=>4.3% mortality. To be clear that is 𝟰𝟯𝘅 more 𝗱𝗲𝗮𝗱𝗹𝘆 than the 0.1% flu mortality rate. #Obama handled Flu https://t.co/Tay7yzS8Gu

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
